greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct prime factors p such that p^p is a divisor of n-th number > 0 that is a sum of distinct primorial numbers, A276156(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276156(n) = { my(p=2,pr=1,s=0); while(n,if(n%2,s += pr); n >>= 1; pr *= p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
xref: Cf. A328832 (gives A276156(k) for those k for which a(k) = 0).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2019
